algorithm_technique: Prefix sums and combinatorics with frequency tracking
problem_summary_simple: Count subsequences of size 5 where the middle element is the unique mode.
problem_summary_technical: Uses prefix sums and combinatorics to count valid subsequences by iterating through potential middle elements.
key_insights: The core idea is to fix the middle element and count valid combinations from left and right.
Maintaining prefix sums of frequencies and their squares/products is crucial for efficient calculation.
Combinations (nC2) are used to count ways to pick elements from left and right.
